newsitem.title: USA: U.S. says second Iraq attack successful.
newsitem.headline: U.S. says second Iraq attack successful.

text.p: The second U.S. attack on Iraqi targets appears to have been a success, a White House official said on Wednesday.

"It appears to have been successful," deputy national security adviser Sandy Berger said on NBC Television's "Today Show." He said that the Pentagon was still doing an overall assessment but "the initial indications are positive."
He was commenting on a second wave of American missile attacks on targets in southern Iraq aimed at knocking out Iraqi's air defense operations. He did not rule out further attacks.
